Package business_logic

Class UserFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • business_logic.UserFacade
  • public class UserFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    UserFacade is a Singleton class. Simplify the use of buisness logic subsystem for the GUI layer. Facade pattern. Contains the buisness methods.
    Author:
    Salim Azharhoussen, Birane Ba, Raphael Bourret, Nicolas Galois

      • login

        public boolean login​(java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Asks for UserDAO to return a user based on email and password, sets the currentUser to the returned User
        Parameters:
        email - : the user's email
        password - : the user's password
        Returns:
        true if user found, false if user not found or incorrect

      • signUp

        public boolean signUp​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String firstname,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Asks for UserDAO to create a User.
        Parameters:
        name - : the user's name.
        firstname - : the user's firstname.
        email - : the user's email.
        password - : the user's password.
        Returns:
        true if the signup succeed, false otherwise.

      • delete

        public boolean delete​(java.lang.String email)
        Asks for UserDAO to delete a User giving an email.
        Parameters:
        email - : the user's email.
        Returns:
        true if the deletion succeed, false otherwise.
